messages.title: My personal pledges to you
messages.content:
I will continue my programme of regular advice bureau for constituents
I will maintain my regular links with local organisations and charities
I will stand up for the green belt and against inappropriate building development
I will always have a home in the constituency
I will give top priority to the Conservative pledge to stop the closure of the A&E and maternity services at Queen Mary’s hospital, allowing local people to take the final decision over its future

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I came into politics because I want to see a better future for our Country and our local community.
I will stand up for the green belt and against inappropriate building development
I will always have a home in the constituency
I will give top priority to the Conservative pledge to stop the closure of the A&E and maternity services at Queen Mary’s hospital, allowing local people to take the final decision over its future

housing.content: I will stand up for the green belt and against inappropriate building development

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to have had the opportunity to serve you as your Member of Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: My priority to stand up for my constituents and promise to continue to give you my full commitment for the future.

contactInformation.address: 1 Redholm, 4 Shepherds Green, Chislehurst, Kent BR7 6PA

images.caption: Bob & Daphne Neill at home in Shepherds Green
